PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-08662024-07-05PMO
ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisReappointment of MELISSA BLAKE, of Fort McMurray, Alberta, as a special adviser to the Prime Minister, to serve as a federal member of the Independent Advisory Board for Senate Appointments, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, effective August 5, 2024.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Reappointment of MELISSA BLAKE, of Fort McMurray, Alberta, as a special adviser to the Prime Minister, to serve as a federal member of the Independent Advisory Board for Senate Appointments, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, effective August 5, 2024.
